abstract: Web users in emerging markets spend about 30 percent of their online time using Google services, triple the market share that the company has in the United States, according to new data from comScore.
snippet: Web users in emerging markets spend about 30 percent of their online time using Google services, triple the market share that the company has in the United States, according to new data from comScore.
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:11 p.m. Corrected headline to remove China and add Brazil. Thank you to the many people who wrote us about the error.

headline.main: Where Google Is Really Big: India and Brazil

abstract: Google is making an attempt to be seen as a friend to the news industry with a new service it hopes will make it easier for readers to view articles.
snippet: Google is making an attempt to be seen as a friend to the news industry with a new service it hopes will make it easier for readers to view articles.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Google, long seen as an enemy by many in the news industry, is making a bold attempt to be seen as a friend with a new service it hopes will make it easier for readers to read newspaper and magazine articles.

headline.print_headline: Google Site Lets Readers Flip Through the News
